This model is based on the canonical x-vector TDNN-based architecture, but with filter banks replaced with trainable SincNet features. See []( architecture for implementation details. ## Basic usage Using cosine distance directly, this model reaches 2.8% equal error rate (EER) on VoxCeleb 1 test set. This is without voice activity detection (VAD) nor probabilistic linear discriminant analysis (PLDA). Expect even better results when adding one of those. ## Advanced usage ### Running on GPU ### Extract embedding from an excerpt ### Extract embeddings using a sliding window ## Citation
